title: The Quiet Guardian: The Tale of Frank Young
summary: Frank Young, a 60-year-old with a passion for organizing and meditating, discovers his latent superpowers and saves his town from a mysterious threat over the course of a week.
summaryGerman: Frank Young, ein 60-jähriger mit einer Leidenschaft für Organisation und Meditation, entdeckt seine verborgenen Superkräfte und rettet seine Stadt innerhalb einer Woche vor einer mysteriösen Bedrohung.
summaryDutch: Frank Young, een 60-jarige met een passie voor organiseren en mediteren, ontdekt zijn latente superkrachten en redt zijn stad van een mysterieuze dreiging gedurende een week.
summaryFrench: Frank Young, un homme de 60 ans passionné par l'organisation et la méditation, découvre ses superpouvoirs latents et sauve sa ville d'une menace mystérieuse au cours d'une semaine.

story.text: Frank starts his week as usual by organizing his old comic book collection, which unexpectedly triggers a hidden mechanism that bestows him with superhuman abilities.
Feeling energized, Frank practices his newfound powers in the safety of his backyard, slowly gaining control and confidence.
During his morning meditation, Frank senses a strange disturbance in his neighborhood, driving him to investigate discreetly.
Frank discovers a group of robbers planning a heist near his home. Using his powers of organization, he strategizes their capture.
Executing his plan, Frank gently disrupts the robbery, guiding the police silently to the scene without revealing his identity.
The town praises the mysterious hero. Frank spends a quiet day at home, reflecting on his responsibilities as a secret guardian.

ending: With the town secure and his secret safe, Frank continues his peaceful life, forever ready to protect those in need.
moral: Even the most ordinary among us can become extraordinary when the moment demands.
